title: Blurb.com
content:
has anybody ever used blurb [http://www.blurb.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080612045200/http:/www.blurb.com/ "http://www.blurb.com/") to create a book? The prices are incredibaly low & the quality seems decent enough...there must be a catch..has anybody had any experience using these guys?

author: j. cullen
